quote_first: “He will probably return with Mrs. Dashwood,” she said, “for early this morning he sent a telegram so that she take the ten-thirty-five train from Chicago, which will arrive here at
quote_last: . Is there any news of Mr. Dashwood?” she added, her motherly face betraying keen anxiety.
title: Out of Death's Shadow
author: Nicholas Carter

title: The Evening's at Seven
author: James Thurber
